remarks: Kernel of the vector to functional map.  TODO: make this become ~ lcfrlem11 .  (Contributed by NM, 29-Mar-2015.)
statement:
hvmaplkr.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hvmaplkr.o $e |- O = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hvmaplkr.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hvmaplkr.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
hvmaplkr.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` U ) $.
hvmaplkr.l $e |- L = ( LKer ` U ) $.
hvmaplkr.m $e |- M = ( ( HVMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hvmaplkr.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hvmaplkr.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( V \ { .0. } ) ) $.
hvmaplkr $p |- ( ph -> ( L ` ( M ` X ) ) = ( O ` { X } ) ) $.
